sentences.en: " No ,'said India, her pale eyes glittering. " I'm not afraid. "
sentences.cn: " 不怕, " 英迪亚回答说, 她那灰色的眼睛闪出了亮光.

sentences.en: A school of tiny, glittering fish flicked hither and thither.
sentences.cn: 一群小小的 、 闪闪发光的鱼儿东游西窜、忽隐忽现.

sentences.en: And here again was the scarlet misery glittering on the old spot!
sentences.cn: ——可现在那红色的悲惨又重新在老地方闪闪发光了!

sentences.en: He has a glittering career ahead of him.
He strove for the glittering prizes of politics.
sentences.cn: 他力争在政界取得辉煌的成绩.

sentences.en: Her decision to retire brought down the curtain on a glittering 30 - year career.
sentences.cn: 她退休的决定给她30年辉煌的职业生涯画上了句号.

sentences.en: His glittering career was cut short by a heart attack.
sentences.cn: 他辉煌的事业因心脏病发作而被迫终止。
雨使华丽的庆典大为逊色.

sentences.en: She saw small boats passing to and fro on that glittering highway.
sentences.cn: 她看到许多小船在这耀眼的河道上来往.

sentences.en: She stood drinking in the glittering view.
sentences.cn: 她站在那儿，陶醉于那流光溢彩的美景中。

sentences.en: The cloudless sky was jewelled with myriads of glittering stars.
sentences.cn: 无云的晴空镶嵌着无数颗闪烁的星星.

sentences.en: The plate is overlaid with glittering gold.
sentences.cn: 那个盘子镀有闪闪发光的金子.

sentences.en: The reins and the breeches of the groom are glittering white.
sentences.cn: 车夫的缰绳和裤子也又亮又白.

sentences.en: The tide was going out, and the sand was smooth and glittering.
sentences.cn: 正在退潮，沙滩平坦，闪着微光。

sentences.en: There's a glittering array of glass to choose from at markets.
sentences.cn: 市场上有很多晶莹闪亮的玻璃制品可供挑选。

trans.tran_cn: 辉煌的，闪闪发光的，光辉灿烂的
trans.tran_en: giving off many small flashes of light

trans.tran_cn: 闪烁，闪耀，闪光(glitter的现在分词)
